text:
running:
  ant -Dant.version=2

with:
  <target name="echo">
    <echo message="ant.version = ${ant.version}"/>
  </target>

outputs:
     [echo] ant.version = 2

Is this a bug?
creator: jakarta@ehatchersolutions.com

text: What do you say Erik?  Is this a bug or a feature?  Make your call. ;-)
creator: umagesh@apache.org
jakarta@ehatchersolutions.com
text:
I still call it a bug - there really should be a special class of properties 
that cannot even be touched by -D.  But for now its a "feature".  I'm marking 
as "LATER" for now for us to address in the future.
